targets.query: SELECT "runno" FROM "dunedaq.rcif.runinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "runno" > 0) AND $timeFilter

panels.description: Counters of the TP generated by the most active channels

targets.query: SELECT "channel", "num_tp" FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.TPChannelInfo" WHERE "partition_id"='${partition}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source_id"

panels.title: TP channel counters

targets.query: SELECT sum("num_tp") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.TPChannelInfo" WHERE "partition_id"='${partition}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

panels.description: This should only contain the rates for TP DLHs

targets.query: SELECT mean("rate_tp_hits")*1000 FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

panels.title: Producers - TP hit rates

panels.description: This should only contain the rates for TP DLHs

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_sent")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

panels.title: Producers - TP Sent rates

panels.description: This should only contain the rates for TP DLHs

targets.query: SELECT mean("rate_payloads_consumed")*1000 FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

panels.title: Handlers - TP receiving rates

panels.description: This should only contain the rates for TP DLHs

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_send_failed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_in_tpsets_send_failed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_suppressed_too_long")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_suppressed_tardy")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Producers - Total TP dropped rates

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_sent")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tpsets_sent")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("rate_payloads_consumed")*1000 FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_send_failed")), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_in_tpsets_send_failed")), 1s) +  non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_suppressed_too_long")), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_suppressed_tardy")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_heartbeats")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_sent")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tpsets_sent")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

panels.description: This should only contain the rates for TP DLHs

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_send_failed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_in_tpsets_send_failed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_suppressed_too_long")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_suppressed_tardy")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Handlers - Total TP dropped rates

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_send_failed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_suppressed_tardy")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_suppressed_too_long")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

panels.title: Producers - TP Suppresed rates: too long

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_in_tpsets_send_failed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

panels.title: Producers - TP send failed due to failed TPSets rates

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tpsets_send_failed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_send_failed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_suppressed_tardy")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_suppressed_too_long")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

panels.title: Handlers - TP Suppresed rates: too long

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_in_tpsets_send_failed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

panels.title: Handlers - TP send failed due to failed TPSets rates

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tpsets_send_failed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT mean("num_buffer_elements") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_buffer_cleanups")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND  "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_payloads_overwritten")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND  "source_id" =~ /.*\.tp_datahandler_\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("num_buffer_cleanups") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("num_payloads_overwritten") FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE  ("source_id" = '${partition}.${readout_app}.${readout_module}')  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" where $timeFilter
list.label: Partition name
list.name: partition
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" where $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW  TAG VALUES FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WITH KEY="source_id" WHERE $timeFilter AND "partition_id"='${partition}'
list.name: readout_app
list.query: SHOW  TAG VALUES FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WITH KEY="source_id" WHERE $timeFilter AND "partition_id"='${partition}'

list.definition: SHOW  TAG VALUES FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WITH KEY="source_id" WHERE $timeFilter AND "partition_id"='${partition}'
list.name: readout_module
list.query: SHOW  TAG VALUES FROM "dunedaq.readoutlibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WITH KEY="source_id" WHERE $timeFilter AND "partition_id"='${partition}'
